data: You peeked through a someone's window like a total punk, [tw=wait 0.25]disregarding the basic rules of etiquette. [tw=wait 0.5]Luckily,[tw=wait 0.25] the person in the room doesn't really mind it. [tw=wait 0.5]Furthermore, [tw=wait 0.25]he doesn't even know what etiquette is. [tw=wait 0.5]Looks like today is your lucky day.
Here's you chance to take the presented opportunity and get to know each other. [tw=wait 0.5]Do you want to meet this dude?
Albeit, [tw=wait 0.25]it's not like you have a choice in this matter. [tw=wait 0.5]I've not coded the choices system yet. [tw=wait 0.5]Apologies.
Let's pretend that you said yes.

The name of the dude in question is [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]Sam[/color][/background]. [tw=wait 0.5]Right now he is standing in his glorious [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]lair[/color][/background]. [tw=wait 0.5]Well, [tw=wait 0.25]actually[tw=wait 0.25], it's not a lair. [tw=wait 0.5]And it's also not his.

Sam pays a hefty bill to his [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]landlord[/color][/background] for the living room located [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]in an abandoned basement[/color][/background]. [tw=wait 0.5]It's also his [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]office[/color][/background] where he works as a [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]customer support agent[/color][/background]. [tw=wait 0.5]He does it when he is not studying in a [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]college[/color][/background].

The room is equipped with a barely working [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]computer[/color][/background], [tw=wait 0.25]used mainly to [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]waste time on the Internet[/color][/background]. [tw=wait 0.5]Sam also receives calls from [background=#FFFFFF][color=#000000]angry clients[/color][/background] on it.
But now he's resting carelessly for some reason.
If only we knew why does this grumpy lazybone refuse to work.
Perhaps you could try to imagine what he thinks.
[color=#FFD800]*You try to imagine what Sam thinks.*[/color]
[color=#9198C9]I am Sam now. [tw=wait 0.5]Wait, [tw=wait 0.25]why do I even think about it? [tw=wait 0.5]I've always been Sam. [tw=wait 0.5]Damn, [tw=wait 0.25]I'm still sleepy.[/color]
[color=#9198C9][sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]Oh![/sfdx] [tw=wait 0.5]New message. [tw=wait 0.5]What in [sfdx=offsety 2*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]hell[/sdfx] do you want from me?[/color]
[color=#9198C9]Maybe I can just... [tw=wait 0.5]go back to bed. [tw=wait 0.75]Nah, [tw=wait 0.25]my boss will kill me if this is a customer trying to contact me.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]I need to read this message. [tw=wait 0.5]I hope my computer is still working after staying connected all night.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]I always forget to repair the damaged wallpaper. [tw=wait 0.5]Wait, [tw=wait 0.25]what did I just say? [tw=wait 0.5]I can't remember. [tw=wait 0.5]Oh,  [tw=wait 0.25]whatever.[/color]
Interesting view on your own poem, Sam.

[color=#9198C9]The skeleton poster! [tw=wait 0.5]I got it from my grandpa when I was a kid. [tw=wait 0.5]He was happy to give it to me even though it was super rare. [tw=wait 0.5]I still don't understand the meaning behind it... [tw=wait 0.5]I wish I had asked him. [tw=wait 0.5]Miss you, old man.[/color]
You click on yourself[tw=wait 0.25].[tw=wait 0.25].[tw=wait 0.25]. [tw=wait 0.5]This is becoming a [sfdx=offsety 0.5*cos(t * 800 + i * 100)]problem[/sdfx].

I forbid you to click on yourself, [tw=wait 0.25][sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]you half-witted
moron[/sfdx].
[color=#9198C9]This torn wallpaper reminds me about something...[/color]

[color=#9198C9]I also remember when grandpa Helix was babysitting me and I was playing toy soldiers. [tw=wait 0.5]He decided that it would be a good idea if I played with a real gun. [tw=wait 0.5]Obviously, it was not loaded [tw=wait 0.25], but dear god, [tw=wait 0.25]my parents were livid.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]Maybe one day I will write a poem about my life.[/color]
Dedicate it to your beloved computer.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: Do you remember the password you gave me?
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: Well, turns out the best encryption algorithm is not really the best.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: Mind your words, buddy. I only conducted a small penetration test.
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: Oh, I understand. So, did the server succeed?
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: Let's say it got an "F" mark.
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: Damn, it means it is not getting in college.
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: And can prepare to die of starvation after wandering empty streets!
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: Firstly, I checked the documents for your last name.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: All of the information regarding the incident with your grandfather.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: That's what I'm doing right now. Wait for the file to upload.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: I've come across some really dark stuff.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: Did you know that BIOS company conducted human experiments in the past?
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: The mind control experiment was the most impressive.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: His assistant's name was Harry, right?
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: Um, no? I don't know any Harry.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: His full name is encrypted, but I managed to find out his initials.
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: You must be mistaken. I have never heard this name.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: You can check the documents yourself. They will be saved in the [b]topsecret[/b] folder.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: You wanted me to look for details about your high-school girlfriend, right?
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: she was not my girlfriend. just very close friend.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: In any case, I don't think you should spy on her using stolen credentials.
[color=#97CE37][b]mary9r[/b][/color]: Anyway, the only thing I found about her is this photo with you. This was before college, right?
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: i didn't have time to tell you.
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: hazel... didn' make it through college.
[color=#132E8B][b]imsam1p[/b][/color]: she was going to get a scholarship for her academic achievements.
You know, [tw=wait 0.25]she was not from a really rich family.
Her mother had troubles with health.
Money from scholarship could help a lot.

Hazel worked day and night to achieve it. [tw=wait 0.5]Beat herself up over any failure.[tw=wait 0.5]Over any mistake. [tw=wait 0.5]She wanted everything to be perfect. [tw=wait 0.5]Make it the best way possible so her goal could be achieved.
[tw=wait 0.5]She didn't sleep very often. [tw=wait 0.5]It was scary to look at her. [tw=wait 0.5]She was drained.
One day, [tw=wait 0.25]we decided to throw a party to cheer her up.
Ordered pizza. [tw=wait 0.5]Bought some booze. [tw=wait 0.5]I brought her favourite horror movie.
We waited and waited for her to show up at the party.
Same thing happened the following day.
No one knew where she was. [tw=wait 0.5]Her mother was mortified.
It was already too late when we understood that she was gone.
I would like to believe that she was just burnout from all the stresses and fear of failing everyone.
Left everything. [tw=wait 0.5]Caught a bus and ran far away from all of that. [tw=wait 0.5]Started her life from scratch.
If only I could call her the day she disappeared. [tw=wait 0.5]I would tell her the kindest words I know.
Sorry for involving you in this.
It was so... [tw=wait 0.5]sudden. [tw=wait 0.5]She was just gone one day. [tw=wait 0.5]And no one truly knows what happened.
I thought I could find something to understand the reason behind it. [tw=wait 0.5]Her last message was the password I sent you.
But you didn't find anything important about her.
I really needed someone to talk to.
[color=#9198C9]Hold on for a second!  [tw=wait 0.5]Someone's calling me. [tw=wait 0.5]Probably a customer.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]I hope it isn't another prank call.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]There's a dude who freaking loves to screw with me.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]He calls very often. [tw=wait 0.5]And he's always using the same joke about aliens invading Earth.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]It was hilarious for the first time. [tw=wait 0.5] Now it's just annoying.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]I swear, [tw=wait 0.25]I'll beat him to death after I find out who he is. [tw=wait 0.5]Stupid little punk.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]Hello! [tw=wait 0.5]It is BIOS Corporation support service. [tw=wait 0.5]Uh,[tw=wait 0.25] what's your problem?[/color]
[color=#FF252C]HELLO, [tw=wait 0.25]HELLO. [tw=wait 0.5]stupid little PUNK. [tw=wait 0.25]i say HELLO to you, [tw=wait 0.25]do you [tw=wait 0.25]UNDERSTAND?[/color]
[tw=wait 0.25][sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)][color=#9198C9]WHAT DID I TELL YOU ABOUT CALLING THIS NUMBER???[/color][/sdfx]
[color=#FF252C]I will BEAT YOU to DEATH [tw=wait 0.25]when I FIND you, [tw=wait 0.25]HUMAN.[/color]
[color=#97CE37]Relax, Sam. [tw=wait 0.5]It's just a phone call. [tw=wait 0.5]Everything will be okay![/color]
[color=#FF252C]do not hang up the phone!!! [sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)][tw=wait 0.25]please, [tw=wait 0.25]please, [tw=wait 0.25]please![/sdfx][/color]
[color=#FF252C]i know you breached bios corp servers. [tw=wait 0.5]does not sound very [tw=wait 0.25]LEGAL to me[tw=wait 0.25]?[tw=wait 0.25]?[tw=wait 0.25]?[/color]
[color=#97CE37]It's truly oh shit, Sam. [tw=wait 0.5]I didn't use VPN this time, [tw=wait 0.25]it was too slow.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]I want YOU to listen to ME, [tw=wait 0.25]you stupid little PUNKS! [tw=wait 0.5]uhh, [tw=wait 0.25]by the way. [tw=wait 0.5]am i polite enough to fit human standards?[/color]
[color=#FF252C]okay, then i will bit you to DEATH, humans!!! [tw=wait 0.5]please?[/color]
[color=#FF252C]i will put you in a [sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]JAIL[/sdfx] thing.[/color]
[color=#97CE37]Because if you do it I'll drop out of college. [tw=wait 0.5]I'll have to wander empty streets and die of starvation then.[/color]

[color=#FF252C]oh.[tw=wait 0.25].[tw=wait 0.25].[tw=wait 0.25] i do not want anyone to die.
[/color]
[color=#97CE37]Then forget that we hacked BIOS servers and no one will die.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]i cannot![tw=wait 0.25]![tw=wait 0.25]![tw=wait 0.25] [sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]everyone[/sdfx] will die if you do not listen to me.[/color]

[color=#97CE37][tw=wait 0.25]I don't think we have a choice, [tw=wait 0.25]Sam. [tw=wait 0.5]We will not get out of this if somebody finds out about us hacking BIOS servers. [tw=wait 0.5]BIOS corp is evil. [tw=wait 0.5]Their insane monopoly controls everything. [tw=wait 0.5]Going against them equals death. [tw=wait 0.5]And we fucked with their property, [tw=wait 0.25]that's what we did.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]that's TRUE![tw=wait 0.25]![tw=wait 0.25]![tw=wait 0.25] you better listen to me![/color]
[color=#FF252C]it all started with your grandfather Helix, [tw=wait 0.25]sam. [/color]
[color=#FF252C]he and his friend. [tw=wait 0.5]they started it all.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]he managed to establish contact with [sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]us[/sfdx].[/color]
[color=#FF252C][color=#FF252C][sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]harry houdini[/sdfx] wanted to exchange our technologies for access to your planet[/color]
[color=#97CE37]I got it. [tw=wait 0.5]Harry wanted to build a mind-control device, right? [tw=wait 0.5]I read about it in documents.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]he wanted to use it for his [color=#FF252C][sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]FINAL SEANCE[/sdfx].[/color]
[color=#9198C9][sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]Are you making fun of me?[/sdfx][/color]
[color=#9198C9][sfdx=offsety 1*cos(t * 800 + i * 150)]My grandpa died. [tw=wait 0.5]My best friend killed herself. [tw=wait 0.5]And you're laughing.[/sdfx][/color]
[color=#9198C9]If you want to put me in jail just go for it.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]your best friend? [tw=wait 0.5]you mean girl in huge glasses that loves purple color?[/color]
[color=#FF252C]you are right about her not being alive. [tw=wait 0.5]but she is not dead either.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]you don't actually know what happened to her?[/color]
[color=#FF252C]i wanted to tell you. [tw=wait 0.5]but you won't listen. [tw=wait 0.5]only keep insulting me.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]your friend conducted a very DANGEROUS experiment[/color]
[color=#FF252C]She worked for BIOS and paid with her life for that.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]They continued research started by your grandpa.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]They tried to restore contact with us.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]Many years from now on, we will invade your planet, humans.[/color]

[color=#FF252C]In year TWENTY-TWENTY Earth will be INVADED. [tw=wait 0.5]Most of the humanity will be defeated without a fight, [tw=wait 0.25]by a mysterious molecule carried by our species. [tw=wait 0.5]Then we'll reign the Earth.[/color]
[color=#97CE37]It's in your interest to let this happen.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]after we invaded your planet[tw=wait 0.25].[tw=wait 0.25].[tw=wait 0.25]. a more powerful entity appeared.[/color]
[color=#97CE37]But what do you think we can do?[/color]
[color=#FF252C]literally nothing. [tw=wait 0.5]i just wanted you to live with the information about your world ending one day inevitably.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]just KIDDING. [tw=wait 0.5]it was a normal HUMAN joke, [tw=wait 0.25]that's what I did.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]i've an amazingly detailed PLAN. [tw=wait 0.5]i've had my entire life to prepare me for this.[/color]
[color=#FF252C]it's not safe to use phone for this. [tw=wait 0.5]add me in telecart. [tw=wait 0.5]my nickname is [/color][color=#FFFFFF]nagel6n[/color][color=#FF252C].[/color]
[color=#9198C9]That's really sweet and all. [tw=wait 0.5]But you have to promise something before we'll help you.[/color]
[color=#97CE37]Sam. [tw=wait 0.5]We're not in a position to stipulate.[/color]
[color=#9198C9]Second, [tw=wait 0.25]promise that you'll tell everything you know about Hazel.[/color]
